brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine whether Zydena (Udenafil) has positive effect on
      cognitive function in patients with Alzheimer's disease.

      This study is a randomized, double blind, placebo-controlled multicenter study.

clinical_study.brief_title: Zydena on Cognitive Function of Alzheimer's Disease Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Zydena (Udenafil) on Cognitive Function of Alzheimer's Disease Patients: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-controlled Multicenter Study

primary_outcome.time_frame: from baseline to Week 12 and Week 24 after the administration of the medication

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Measured by MMSE, Clinical Dementia Rating Sum of Boxes, ADCS-ADL, COWAT, Digit Symbol Coding, Trail Making Test-E
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from baseline to Week 12 and Week 24
from baseline to Week 12 and Week 24
from baseline to Week 12 and Week 24
